genresAdvancedInfo.name: forro instrumental
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Forro instrumental is a type of forro that focuses on the instrumentation rather than vocals. It is often performed by skilled musicians who showcase their talents through intricate solos and improvisation. The sound is typically more laid-back and relaxed than other types of forro, making it a great choice for background music or for listening to while relaxing.

index.head-title: Spotify Top artists and songs - Stats about your music on Spotify
